EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy today's voicemail (1563554992.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy today's voicemail (1563554992.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Marcia,
I hope all is well with you today and please forgive the delay in my response. I am told that we are working on something for the Children's Aid Society as a whole. Once those details are available I will be in touch. In the meantime, should you need anything from me please let me know. Thank you for your time and I hope you've had a great week and you'll have a great weekend.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
